pages.text: Pederpes was a basal Carboniferous tetrapod that lived a semiaquatic lifestyle. It was an average sized early tetrapod and it would have been able to sustain itself quite some time on land, though would have hunted in the water.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw/Cooked Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Spawn like Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
